mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM notice

SELECT notice_idx, admin_id, subject, content,reg_date, rnum FROM (SELECT notice_idx, admin_id, subject, content,reg_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY notice_idx DESC) AS rnum FROM notice) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT notice_idx, admin_id, subject, content,reg_date FROM notice WHERE notice_idx=#{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_idx, admin_id, subject, content) VALUES (seq_notice.NEXTVAL, #{admin_id},#{subject},#{content})
